fields.label: VAT type
fields.options:
effective - agreed counterclaims
effective - counterclaims received
flat rate - agreed counterclaims
flat rate - counterclaims received

fields.depends_on: eval:doc.vat_type == 'effective - agreed counterclaims' || doc.vat_type == 'effective - counterclaims received'
fields.label: Non-taxable revenue (205)

fields.depends_on: eval:doc.vat_type == 'effective - agreed counterclaims' || doc.vat_type == 'effective - counterclaims received'
fields.label: Normal (303)

fields.depends_on: eval:doc.vat_type == 'effective - agreed counterclaims' || doc.vat_type == 'effective - counterclaims received'
fields.label: Reduced (313)

fields.depends_on: eval:doc.vat_type == 'effective - agreed counterclaims' || doc.vat_type == 'effective - counterclaims received'
fields.label: Lodging (343)

fields.depends_on: eval:(doc.vat_type == 'flat rate - agreed counterclaims' || doc.vat_type == 'flat rate - counterclaims received') && doc.end_date > '2023-12-31'
fields.label: Amount 1 (323)

fields.depends_on: eval:(doc.vat_type == 'flat rate - agreed counterclaims' || doc.vat_type == 'flat rate - counterclaims received') && doc.end_date > '2023-12-31'
fields.label: Amount 2 (333)
